info.author: Yusuke Shinyama
info.description:
unagi.py is a system monitoring tool for a small, loosely coupled cluster
environment where trusted users run various programs from time to time. It helps
users to utilize the machine resources cooperatively by reporting the current
status of a cluster. It periodically gathers system information from all
machines and also acts as a simple HTTP server through which a user can view a
status report.
info.name: unagi.py
info.html_description: unagi.py is a system monitoring tool for a small, loosely coupled cluster environment where trusted users run various programs from time to time. It helps users to utilize the machine resources cooperatively by reporting the current status of a cluster. It periodically gathers system information from all machines and also acts as a simple HTTP server through which a user can view a status report.
